de: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba -To the Swordsmith Village- is a feature-length cut of Episodes 10 and 11 of the Entertainment District Arc along with the extended Episode 1 of the upcoming Swordsmith Village Arc
nm: Demon Slayer: Kimetsu no Yaiba – To the Swordsmith Village
jp: Kimetsu no Yaiba: To the Katanakaji no Sato-hen
